abstract: Jorge Ciro Fucile Perdomo (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈxoɾxe fuˈsile]; born 19 November 1984) is an Uruguayan professional footballer who plays for F.C. Porto in Portugal. A defender, he is equally at ease on the right or left flank.After starting out at Liverpool Montevideo he moved to Porto in Portugal, going on to appear in 155 official games over the course of eight seasons and win 12 major titles, namely five national championships and the 2011 Europa League.An Uruguayan international since 2006, Fucile represented the country at the 2010 World Cup and the 2007 Copa América.
comment: Jorge Ciro Fucile Perdomo (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈxoɾxe fuˈsile]; born 19 November 1984) is an Uruguayan professional footballer who plays for F.C. Porto in Portugal.
name: Fucile, Jorge
